Text:
"Just Two Servings of this ONE Arctic Fatâ€¦"

"Eliminates Nerve Pain,Numbness, Pins and Needles IN WEEKS!"

"Oh My God… I'm On Fire! Help!!"

  • "Patty, help!" he screamed for his wife.
  • "Please do something! I can't take it".
  • Tears rushed down his face…
  • Patty jolted out of bed, looking at him in shock…
  • "Charles, honey NOTHING is on fire! What are you
    talking about??"
  • He kept screaming…
  • Pleading with Patty to get out and call for help before
    the house burned down.
  • "Run!! I can feel the fire all over my feet and my hands!
    Get someone to help!"
  • And then he looked down at his feet…
  • Then his hands…
And then the truth hit him! There WAS no fire.

No house burning down.

  • No flames torching his feet and hands.
  • It was nothing more than the devil itself…
  • Just his horrible, painful neuropathy…
  • Eating away at him yet again.
  • Never leaving his side.
Waking him up…in the middle of the night…burning everywhere.
This was his new life. And NOTHING could stop it.

• He had tried everything…
  • Hot and cold packs, vitamin B shots, even steroids and cortisol injections…
  • The hot and cold packs didn't work at all.
  • Vitamin B shots were amazing… until they weren't…
  • He felt two weeks of relief and all of a sudden the pain, burning and often numbness came back with a roaring vengeance.
  • Cortisol injections… instant relief, and gone minutes later.
  • The moment he stopped taking the shots, it stopped working.
  • He was ready to give up…
  • Resign himself to a life of horrific pain and agony…
  • Until one day (he prayed - only to himself) that he would just end up in some terrible accident.
  • Now that the grandkids were out of the house..
  • It crossed his mind, that it would be better to die.
  • That's how bad it got for Charles…
  • Neuropathy didn't just take away his ability to walk freely, play with his grandkids, and more..
  • It took away his will to live.
  • And he was all but ready to call it quits…

Until a few days later, when I came into the picture.

  • Hi, I'm James Browning…

  • I'm a health researcher…

  • And Charles is my dad.

  • And when I saw an incredible study about a nerve "fat" from the Arctic circle that helps eliminate nerve pain…
  • I could barely contain myself.
  • So I picked up the phone and called dad.
  • "Dad, you're not going to believe this…
  • I think I've found something that could end the pain" I said…
  • I shared with him all the details about the study…
  • How it's been used for thousands of years by inuit tribes in Siberia, who don't suffer from nerve pain.
  • And how the study revealed that most conventional nerve pain pills, and creams…
  • Are completely worthless… maybe even a waste of money.
  • That the researchers think it's going to really change how doctors treat neuropathy and nerve pain…
Because when they can add this one fat and a few other ingredients to anyone's diet…
In just a few weeks, the pain starts to disappear…
"You have to try this, Dad!" I said…

• But he had had enough…
  • "NO! I'm done", he said…
  • "I've tried everything and this is probably just some trick. Nothing
    will work for me. I know it."
  • But I refused to give up.
  • "I know what you mean, Dad. I've
    seen all that you've been through
    and I wish it would just go away too…"
  • "But if there's one thing I know, it's
    that you do NOT give up this easily.
  • That's the way you raised me dad!"
  • "You have healthy, happy kids and grandkids….
  • And you just can't give up on us this easily
So let's try this. You never know, dad."

"Okay", he said reluctantly.

  • And it started out just like everything else he tried before… slow…
  • He went in with all the best intentions…
  • And yet again…week 1 nothing.
  • Week 2, nothing…
  • My dad decided he was ready to throw in the towel…
  • "James, I told you this is just more nonsense. It hasn't done a darn thing for me and it's already been two whole weeks!"
  • I had to laugh at that.
  • "Dad, you know I love you, but you really don't follow the directions sometimes!
  • It said in the study… for some people it can take 3 weeks for the ingredients to really kick in and start working at full capacity.
  • So just keep taking it and let's see what happens next week."
  • Week 3 rolled around the corner, and Monday, my dad thought the pain went down a bit.
    Nothing major, but definitely a little better.
  • By Wednesday, he was walking around the house more…
    And for the first time in a while, slept without waking up once from shooting pain.
By Saturday, it was like a whole new world.
But Sunday was the real game changer… not just for my dad, but for my mom Patty too.

He surprised her with something he hadn't said in nearly over a decade…

"Honey, these ingredients James has me taking are amazing

My pain is almost gone…and I think we can start our walks again.

  • Do you want to come with me?"
  • My mom broke down in tears.
  • They were tears of JOY.
  • Not tears of anguish and pain like it had been so many times these last few years.
  • It was like old times again.
  • My dad and mom hadn't taken their nighttime walks around town in over 15 years!
  • As a matter of fact it felt like every day these last 15 years were passing minutes of uncertainty and fear that Charles's nerves would give out for good…
  • That he'd be forced into a wheelchair for the rest of life…
  • And that if the pain and his failing body didn't send him to an early grave…
  • That his worsening mental condition surely would.
But today was different.

It was a new day.
The start of something amazing for Patty and Charles.
  • And that's why she cried and cried until my dad grabbed her and held her tight, saying…
  • "I love you so much honey. Thanks for being here with me for so long…
  • If this keeps working like it has already, I think we'll be just fine…
  • Now let's go on that walk shall we?"
  • And off they went…
But what was SO different about this nerve pain breakthrough that…Helped my dad get his life back in 3 weeks?

Well in order to best answer that question…
  • I need to share with you a story that most people have never heard…
  • It's about a man named Dr. Harold Draper…
  • And his discovery that helped end my father's never pain and could do the same for you!

Dr. Draper has been profiled all over top scientific journals…

And even mainstream media like Discover Magazine, Organic Authority, and more…

Unfortunately, because of his recent discoveries….

Pharma manufacturers are hoping to shut word of this down once and for all…

So pay close attention, because I'm not sure how long I'll be able to keep this presentation up.

  • As a matter of fact if you come back tomorrow, I can't guarantee this will still be here…
  • Dr. Draper is the "mad genius" behind this discovery that may hold the secret to ending nerve pain once and for all.

One morning while studying an Inuit tribe in Siberia he stumbled onto what I call…

"The Inuit Nerve Pain Miracle"

  • As you may have heard there's a thing called The Inuit Paradox…
How can people who gorge on fat and rarely see a vegetable be healthier than we are?

• It surprised Harold so much that he had to take a deeper look.
  • Talking with the tribes, and especially the elders (thought to hold thousands of years of knowledge passed down through generations)…
  • Harold discovered that…
  • While the Inuit people of Siberia as well as Northwestern Alaska have traditionally had a diet full of fats…
  • Seal blubber, crab and lots of fish like salmon, whitefish, tomcod, pike, and char…
  • The Inuits report all kinds of miraculous health benefits that the mainstream American establishment would never believe, let alone recommend…
  • Not because it doesn't work…
  • But because it would hurt their coffers too much to not prescribe pricey drugs for every condition under the sun.

You see these Inuits, eating high fat diets, reported….
  • A shockingly low risk of cardiac death…
  • And improved outcomes in a variety of disease states, including:
  • Sepsis
  • Cystic fibrosis
  • Some forms of cancer
  • Diabetes
  • Rheumatoid arthritis
  • Crohn's disease
  • Heart disease
  • And depressive disorders
And some scientists believe it's all because of ONE Fat that they take every day.

• I'll tell you about that in a minute but first…
  • What you may not have heard is…
  • The Inuits have very little if ANY diabetes, obesity and other health conditions that are killing Americans every single day.
  • And moreover…
Dr. Draper discovered that with Inuits, eating hight fat diets, neuropathy is non-existent

And it's all thanks to this curious little type of fat that every Inuit eats from the day they're born to the day they die.

Nerve Fat Density

But what shocked Draper the most is… he found the REAL reason they don't have nerve pain… Is because they have extremely high levels of… NERVE FAT DENSITY!

• That's what I call the concentrated extra layer of fat around the nerves that all Inuits seem to have…
  • But this nerve fat layer gets depleted in most Americans after years of poor diet, exercise, and other habits…
  • Dr. Draper realized that by just adding in key ingredients to the American diet that Inuits consume daily…
  • He would be able to increase Nerve Fat Density in all neuropathy patients.

The issue was figuring out not only which fat to use…

  • But which exact compound was most effective for Inuits.
  • After diving deeper into the research, and speaking with Inuit tribal elders…
  • He realized that as suspected…

All Fats are NOT Created Equal!
  • And all the fatty ingredients that Inuits eat are NOT magically responsible for medical benefits…
  • There's a weird and different fat, rather a "fatty oil", that Inuits get every day…
  • It's a type of Omega-3 fatty acid.
  • Now most Americans take, or least try to take, Omega 3 fish oils regularly…

  • Yet nerve pain is still rampant…

  • And that's because the vast majority of Omega-3's are absolutely useless!
  • Most Omega 3's in the market come from fish oil…
  • But what most people don't know is…

• Most fish oils only contain 30% or less of actual Omega 3
  • The other 70% is miscellaneous fat not listed on the product label.

• Even worse, that 30% of regular Omega 3s sold in stores are called Ethyl Esters…
  • Ethyl Ester Omega 3s are so harsh that they force your liver to release bile to break it down…
  • Which then causes burns in your stomach lining…
  • Rendering the little Omega 3s in the capsule all but useless.
  • As a matter of fact, a recent study proved this…

Showing how Ethyl Ester fish oils dropped into a styrofoam cup burned through it in minutes…

  • Just like it does in our stomach lining.
  • And for those of you who don't take Ethyl Ester fish oils?
  • It's probably not many of you…
  • But if you did find a way around it, you'd still be stuck with Omega 3s sold that may be marketed as healthier, green and sustainable…
  • But only because they come from vegetable sources..
  • Mainly flax and chia seeds.
  • And what no one realizes (except greedy Omega-3 manufacturers) is…
  • Vegetable sources of omega-3s do not have the same molecular structure as the long-chained fatty acids that Inuits use and consume daily…
  • Which means not only are they practically useless for your nerves…
  • But they also don't give ANY of the other benefits that Omega-3's claim to do.

The fact is, there are only 3 ways to get the same nerve pain freedom that Inuits enjoy…

First, go to the Inuit tribes up in Siberia, live how they live and eat the same foods they eat, which is obviously not an option for us…

Second, buy hundreds of cups of flaxseeds, and eat 1 or more of those cups every day for months on end to match the daily intake of potent Omega-3s that Inuits get…

Or, Third, use the little-known secret that Dr. Draper discovered is the REAL reason why the Inuits don't have any nerve pain..

You see, he found that the Inuits consume a surprisingly high level of…

Emulsified Phospholipid Omega 3s (EFO's)

Which leads directly to why this "Inuit Nerve Pain Miracle" is so simple..

Studies have shown that this specific type of Omega 3 called EFO's…

Which is NOTHING like the Omega-3 sold in stores, Amazon or through most other companies, can…

Restore the condition of damaged nerves because…

They actually help your nerves absorb other nutrients that prevent nerve pain.

As a result, EFO's along with other key nutrients can help you…

Improve nerve density.

Boost sensory signal transmission. And…

Stimulate the growth of new nerve cells.

Thereby improving the 3 key factors in nerve pain…

That are not being addressed by most other solutions.

Trying to get EFO's with other Omega-3's…

And without other key ingredients for amazing nerve health…

Is just like throwing money down the toilet!

And I get how that might sound like a bold claim…

So here is proof from a Government Study

The study reveals that typical Omega-3's are simply not effective and will not absorb…

Unless they are "EMULSIFIED".

Not only do you need your Omega 3's derived from the most pure sources on the planet…

But you also need them to go through a process called "emulsification"…

Which allows for the production of a pleasant tasting supplement…

And enhances the digestion and absorption of the fatty acids.

This new form of EFO-based Omega 3 helps your body to absorb other critical nerve health ingredients….

A whopping 13x better than other solutions on the market!

So it's no wonder that it's been the most effective option for neuropathy sufferers.

And even though the Inuits have taken it their entire lives…

The research team that helped me and my dad has discovered a version of this oil that's available to EVERY American…

And it absorbs extremely fast…

Which multiplies its power and creates a "catch up" effect…

So that anyone that starts taking it today can see improvements to their function in a matter of weeks!

My dad is a prime example…

Within just 21 days of taking the formula daily, he was starting to take some walks with my mom Patty…

And within 90 days, he had regained all of his lost energy, was enjoying long vigorous walks - and other activities - with my mom…

And even jogging like old times!

Imagine a future just like my dad's

In just a few months from now, you can be walking, even running around again…

Playing with the kids and grandkids.

Golfing or playing tennis…

Taking long walks on the beach with your spouse, and more.

And all of this is possible thanks to this one miraculous formula!

It was so good that I decided that this formula NEEDED to be distributed around the world…

After all, I was amazed that with just a few simple ingredients, my dad's pain was simply gone…

Even though he suffered with neuropathy over 15 years…

All while spending thousands of dollars between doctors, expensive Vitamin B and Alpha Lipoic Acid injections, pills, books and expensive programs, creams, and more.

So I decided to team up with manufacturers to bring this new "Inuit Nerve Pain Miracle" formula right to you..

It was a big challenge but it came through in a big way!

And most importantly, we made sure the ingredients distributed worldwide through this new and improved formula EXACTLY matched what my dad used to get his life back under control…

INTRODUCING NERVEALIGN

The most advanced neuropathy treatment in the market with EFO's -- what I call "the Intuit Nerve Pain Miracle"

It's a newly-improved, science-backed blend of nerve pain destroying herbs, vitamins, and minerals, including the clinically-studied EFO's fat we've been talking about.

Here is what it does for you in just 2 capsules a day…

  • Helps support, nourish and strengthen the nerves and the nerve linings.
  • Drastically decreases numbness and
    tingling in hands, feet and legs.
  • Dramatically lowers the sensations of burning, stinging and stabbing pains.
  • Aids in the ability to sleep better at night.
  • Overall balance and coordination is improved which helps reduce the risk of falls.
  • Aids in significantly reducing stress and anxiety.
  • Great increase in your energy levels throughout the day!
ORDER NOW!
  • What I love most is…
  • Everyone who works at NerveAlign is passionate about finding a lasting treatment for nerve pain…
  • Just like my dad did for so many years…
  • Because of this, finding natural solutions to health problems is important to us!

And that's why this unique formula contains…
INGREDIENT 1: Right Kind of Omega-3s: The Emulsified Phospholipid Hyper-Absorption Difference

• Emulsified phospholipids are able to raise the % of EPA and DHA…
  • Much more effectively than the ethyl ester Omega 3s found in other products…
  • And remember when I told you about how EPA and DHA are the substances in our eyes…
  • And the raw material for the protective layer of our nerves?
  • Well by just increasing their levels in your body, NerveAlign is made 13 times more absorbable than most other products…
  • All while matching the exact ingredient purity that Inuits get every day.
  • In fact, there are ZERO other products on the market that even come close to matching its absorbability.
  • It's amazing but true!
INGREDIENT 2: Alpha Lipoic Acid: A Breakthrough Antioxidant

• One of the most important ingredients in the NerveAlign formula is Alpha Lipoic Acid (ALA).
  • It's a powerful antioxidant that is best soluble in EFO's Omega-3…
  • ALA has been shown in several double-blind placebo, controlled studies (the gold standard of scientific research) to help with the symptoms associated with neuropathy.

  • On top of that, ALA is the only antioxidant that together with B Vitamins helps turn glucose into energy, leading to a more potent neuropathy pain relief formula.
    • So you can finally say goodbye to nerve pain forever!
INGREDIENT 3: A More Bioavailable Form of Vitamin B1

• B Complex Vitamins are absolutely vital to the protective fatty layer around your nerves.
  • That's why inside each capsule of NerveAlign, there is what I believe to be the most important B Complex Vitamin…
  • And one you won't ever hear about from your doctor.
  • It is called Benfotiamine.
  • It's deficiency is linked to neuropathy in hands and feet.
  • A lot of herbal supplements are packed full of Vitamin B1…
  • Specifically, they include a B1 compound called thiamine…
  • What these companies don't advertise is that the human body has difficulty absorbing thiamine..
  • So all that Vitamin B often goes to waste…
  • Passing right through your body without benefiting your nervous system at all.
  • That's why we knew we'd never just include thiamine…
  • Instead, we spent much more than other companies to get the super absorbable benfotiamine compound…
  • Which according to a study in the International Journal of Clinical Pharmacology, absorbs a whopping 360% better than the typical Vitamin B1 (thiamine).
  • They also found that benfotiamine is substantially less toxic than thiamine…
  • And there have been no reported adverse effects related to its use.
  • Each dose of NerveAlign has 150mg of this revolutionary Benfotiamine form of Vitamin B1 – that's over 6,750% of the daily value rating established by the FDA.
  • What this means for you is that with each NerveAlign capsule, more Vitamin B is being delivered to your cells than with any other product…
  • With the added benefit of cutting out the side effects other products can cause and radically reducing nerve pain!
  • In addition, NerveAlign contains a variety of other B Vitamins, including B2, B6, B9, and B12.
  • Scientists have recently concluded that Vitamin B-12 may reduce nerve damage…
  • And even create new nerve cells!
  • But that wasn't enough…
  • We already realized the formula was not complete without…
INGREDIENT 4: Turmeric - A Safe and Natural Root That Reduces Inflammation and Relieve Pain!

• Many of the symptoms of neuropathy are caused by inflammation in the body.
  • Turmeric has been taking the natural health market by storm, and for good reason.
  • It's a natural source of curcumin, a compound that has been studied and proven to reduce inflammation….
  • And lower inflammation means…
    • Less pain for millions of neuropathy sufferers nationwide.
NERVEALIGN is the BEST and Only "Inuit Nerve Miracle" Solution On the Market

Now with all the highest grade possible ingredients…
  • You can agree that NerveAlign's formula is the most advanced natural nerve pain treatment on the market.
  • And to check the ingredient's authenticity…
  • My dad ran NerveAlign's formula to his physician.
  • Not only did he advise him to keep taking the supplement…
  • But he also started recommending it to other patients.
  • And for good reason…
Each ingredient has been carefully selected because of it's proven results seen in numerous clinical studies…

• And when taken together…
  • They provide an incredible synergistic effect.
  • By now, you might be wondering how you can get your hands on this product?

  • But to really improve your Nerve Fat Density…

  • and maintain your results many months, even years from now…

  • And making your nerve pain a thing of the past.

    On top of that…

However, This Price Is Limited To The First 200 People ONLY! When They're Gone, They're GONE!

  • Like I explained….this is a special relaunch with a new formula from our popular NerveAlign supplement.
  • And we want as many people as possible to try it and see results. Usually when I launch a new product, it works so well that my inbox is flooded with people thanking us and sharing their results.
  • That's why I love what I do and why we're offering it at such a low price to start.
  • But it won't stay at this price for long.
  • And if you are one of the first 200 to take me up on this offer, I'll even sweeten the deal.
  • If you act today and are in the first 200 to try it, I'll knock off an extra 15%.
  • Just type in the code NerveAlignVIP15 on the checkout page to save an EXTRA 15% OFF ANY Order of NerveAlign.
  • Don't forget that code. Write it down now.
  • Here it is again…

NerveAlignVIP15

  • BUT Keep in Mind….
  • Due To High Demand and National Media Exposure, Stock Is Not Guaranteed For Orders That Are Not Completed Today.
  • You can still use the discount code if you come back at a later time, but I can't guarantee the offer will still be valid. Since it's only for the first 200 people who order, I can't be sure how many will have been sold as you're seeing this page now.
  • Since you can still see the offer, it means it's valid right now, so I wouldn't hesitate.
So Click Below The Letter Now To Lock In Your Supply.
And if you want to order on the phone, with a real, live US-based team member just give us a call at 1-(855)-222-5705!

• Best of all…. When You Order today, You'll Also Get a special bonus free.
  • Most supplements make big promises and then leave you high and dry without an ounce of support.
  • They want you to think that nerve pain relief is nothing more than a magic trick and dont acknowledge that you have to put in some work.
  • But that's not why I started this company…
  • We're here to guarantee you see lasting results, so we're throwing in this great free bonus to make sure you see amazing, fast results plus long term maintenance.
That's why I've included our 21 Day Nerve Fix Diet Plan, A $29.95 Value…FREE!

If you need to reduce your pain FAST… in as little as 72 hours, this short guide will show you how. You can read it in less than 15 minutes and the information you learn will kickstart your results in just hours. In it, you'll discover…
  • 7 Foods to Never, EVER Eat If You Have Nerve Pain
  • 6 Steps to Relieve Pain in 14 Days (Plus the 6-Point Quick Start Checklist)
ORDER TODAY and you'll have EVERYTHING you need to succeed…so you can "say goodbye" to the nerve pain for good!

• Now I've told you all about how this product all but saved my dad's life…
  • And how we made sure it includes the absolute best and most scientifically-proven ingredients.
  • And how we have loads of customer testimonials and scientific studies backing the ingredients…
  • So it's time I get brutally honest with you…
  • You have two options in front of you…
  • Option One is to keep doing what you're doing, hope that your current neuropathy treatment will do the trick and that you'll get the pain relief you want with subpar ingredients.
  • OR: Option Two, the smart option, that thousands of people are seeing every day…
  • Take this breakthrough new oil backed my multiple studies and so popular that it was featured widely on online natural health magazines..
  • All with a full 6-month money back guarantee to make sure you see results…
  • Or it's yours free!
  • A future FREE of nerve pain and all the anguish both physically and mentally that comes with it is just around the corner…

Remember, if you're one of the first 200 orders today… you won't get stuck paying $99.95 per bottle for a new bottle like everyone else!

  • And as soon as you order, we'll immediately send your FREE bonuses straight to your inbox, so you can get started while you wait for your first bottles of NerveAlign to arrive at your doorstep.
  • To begin experiencing just how easy it can be to finally remove the obstacles keeping you from the life of your dreams… simply choose a discounted package below and click "Add To Cart" to lock in your special price and make your way to a happier you.
  • Best part?

Your purchase is 100% risk-free and you can easily pay with your credit card or Paypal account — it's fast, safe and 100% secure (backed by 256-bit SSL security)…and 5 times SAFER than using a card at a department store!

Thanks for spending this time with me, and remember not to hesitate..

The discount code I gave you for an additional 15% off will only last for the first 200 customers!

INCLUDES A 6-MONTH 200% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE!

NerveAlign comes with a 180 day, 200% Money Back Guaranteed, Yes! TWO HUNDRED PERCENT! If you change your mind about this decision at any point in the next 180 days – All you need to do is contact us, and we will refund your purchase in full, and if you also send us a letter about your experience with before/after pics using the product, we'll refund you DOUBLE your money-back.

Frequently Asked Questions

How long does it take to receive my shipment?

NerveAlign is shipped within 24-48 hours of your order, and arrives within 2-5 business days upon shipment for U.S. domestic orders. For international orders, shipments usually arrive within 10-14 business days after the shipment date.

How many bottles should I order?

Our best-selling package is the 4 month supply, and for good reason. We've found the vast majority of customers have suffered from nerve pain issues for very long, and this simply won't disappear overnight. Long-term support is always recommended, and the 4-bottle package does just that, while providing a hefty discount too. Those who don't need significant nerve pain loss or are just looking to maintain healthy nerves should opt for our 1 bottle or 2 bottle packages. For anything more than light nerve pain loss, the 4 bottle package is recommended, or at bare minimum the 2-bottle/2-month plan.

What if I'm not satisfied?

NerveAlign is backed by a 200% six-month money-back guarantee. We believe in our product, and the research proves it, so we're more than happy to back it up with an incredible guarantee. However if you do decide it's not for you, just give us a call at 1-855-222-5705 or email support@nervealign.com, anytime within 180 days of your order and we'll be more than happy to help!
